lastMessage:
Both tasks are now complete. Here's a summary of what was done:

## Completed Tasks

### 1. Refactoring HSL hardcoded colors → Tailwind variables

Updated the following files to use Tailwind CSS variables instead of hardcoded HSL values:

| File | Change |
|------|--------|
| [Sidebar.tsx](frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_8%)]` → `bg-sidebar` |
| [ChatZone.tsx](frontend/src/components/ChatZone.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background` |
| [AnalyticsZone.tsx](frontend/src/components/AnalyticsZone.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background` |
| [VisualizationZone.tsx](frontend/src/components/VisualizationZone.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background` |
| [GlobalHeader.tsx](frontend/src/components/GlobalHeader.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background` |
| [CatalogFooter.tsx](frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogFooter.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_8%)]` → `bg-sidebar` |
| [CustomControls.tsx](frontend/src/components/catalog/CustomControls.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_12%)]` → `bg-card` |
| [SchemaNode.tsx](frontend/src/components/catalog/SchemaNode.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_5%_10%)]` → `bg-muted`, `bg-[hsl(220_12%_12%)]` → `bg-card` |
| [TableDetailPanel.tsx](frontend/src/components/catalog/TableDetailPanel.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_8%)]` → `bg-sidebar`, `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background`, `bg-[hsl(220_10%_6%)]` → `bg-sidebar` |
| [PromptsTab.tsx](frontend/src/components/settings/PromptsTab.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background`, `bg-[hsl(220_10%_6%)]` → `bg-sidebar` |
| [TurboEdge.tsx](frontend/src/components/runs/TurboEdge.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background` |
| [TurboNode.tsx](frontend/src/components/runs/TurboNode.tsx) | `bg-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `bg-background`, `border-[hsl(220_10%_10%)]` → `border-background` |

**Preserved:** The special amber warning state `bg-[hsl(40_25%_10%)]` in SchemaNode.tsx was intentionally kept as specified.

**Note:** The HSL values in [layoutUtils.ts](frontend/src/components/catalog/layoutUtils.ts) are inline styles for ReactFlow SVG edges, not Tailwind classes, so they were left unchanged.

### 2. Cleanup of Next.js template files in public/

Removed 5 unused template SVG files:
- `file.svg`
- `globe.svg`
- `next.svg`
- `vercel.svg`
- `window.svg`
